members.name: XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.onabort
members.description: Contains the function to call when a request is aborted and the abort event is received by this object.

members.name: XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.onerror
members.description: Contains the function to call when a request encounters an error and the error event is received by this object.

members.name: XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.onload
members.description: Contains the function to call when an HTTP request returns after successfully fetching content and the load event is received by this object.

members.name: XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.onloadstart
members.description: Contains the function that gets called when the HTTP request first begins loading data and the loadstart event is received by this object.

members.name: XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.onprogress
members.description: Contains the function that is called periodically with information about the progress of the request and the progress event is received by this object.

members.name: XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.ontimeout
members.description: Contains the function that is called if the event times out and the timeout event is received by this object; this only happens if a timeout has been previously established by setting the value of the XMLHttpRequest object's timeout attribute.

members.name: XMLHttpRequestEventTarget.onloadend
members.description: Contains the function that is called when the load is completed, even if the request failed, and the loadend event is received by this object.
